title: Club tag won't show
body: I am in 2 clubs, one with 5 people and one with 7. Neither of the tags show up, I have tried almost everything to get them to work, but they just won't. Neither in game, nor in a lobby will they show up. I have reinstalled twice as well, and nothing changed. Is there anything I can do?

replies.body: Can't do much without the Club Name! Shoot me those names and I can get them fixed up.
The club tag i want to display is for the Club "Saucin On Um"
I've poked that club for you on our side so it should be able to show up now. You'll have to go into the client and choose which tag to show in your profile still.
It works now, thank you so much!
